headline.print_headline: NYC 9/11 Museum Opens to Public in May
headline.main: NYC 9/11 Museum Opens to Public in May

docs.snippet: After years of delays due to funding disputes, engineering challenges and a nearly disastrous flood, a museum dedicated to victims of the 9/11 terror attacks will open to the public in mid-May in a giant cavern beneath the World Trade Center site ...
docs.lead_paragraph: After years of delays due to funding disputes, engineering challenges and a nearly disastrous flood, a museum dedicated to victims of the 9/11 terror attacks will open to the public in mid-May in a giant cavern beneath the World Trade Center site — with a world-class admissions price of $24.

headline.print_headline: W.Va. Official: Spill Company Knew of 2nd Chemical
headline.main: W.Va. Official: Spill Company Knew of 2nd Chemical

docs.snippet: The company at the center of the West Virginia water crisis immediately knew a second chemical leaked from its plant into the Elk River, and told its workers in an email, according to a state environmental official....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company at the center of the West Virginia water crisis immediately knew a second chemical leaked from its plant into the Elk River, and told its workers in an email, according to a state environmental official.

headline.print_headline: Republicans Bash U.S. Law Targeting Offshore Tax Dodgers
headline.main: Republicans Bash U.S. Law Targeting Offshore Tax Dodgers

docs.snippet: The Republican National Committee (RNC) on Friday called for the repeal of a U.S. anti-tax-evasion law, siding with big banks, libertarians and American expatriates that have criticized the Obama administration statute....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican National Committee (RNC) on Friday called for the repeal of a U.S. anti-tax-evasion law, siding with big banks, libertarians and American expatriates that have criticized the Obama administration statute.

headline.print_headline: Comcast to Bring Online Olympics Coverage to TV
headline.main: Comcast to Bring Online Olympics Coverage to TV

docs.snippet: Over the past few Olympics, NBC has shown more live coverage over the Internet than it has on TV. For the upcoming Winter Games, Comcast's Xfinity TV subscribers will be able to tap the breadth of that online coverage on their big screens....
docs.lead_paragraph: Over the past few Olympics, NBC has shown more live coverage over the Internet than it has on TV. For the upcoming Winter Games, Comcast's Xfinity TV subscribers will be able to tap the breadth of that online coverage on their big screens.

headline.main: US Rig Count Stable, Remains This Week at 1,777

headline.sub: Funeral service of protester found dead in wood outside Kiev
headline.main: Funeral service of protester found dead in wood outside Kiev

docs.snippet: Lviv residents attend funeral service of anti-government activist Yury Verbitsky, who was found dead in a wood near Kiev after being taken away from hospital by unknown people. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lviv residents attend funeral service of anti-government activist Yury Verbitsky, who was found dead in a wood near Kiev after being taken away from hospital by unknown people. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: Google Fixes Gmail After Brief Outage Around the World
headline.main: Google Fixes Gmail After Brief Outage Around the World

docs.snippet: Google Inc suffered a service outage on Friday that briefly took down Gmail, the email service used by hundreds of millions of people and many businesses across the globe....
docs.lead_paragraph: Google Inc suffered a service outage on Friday that briefly took down Gmail, the email service used by hundreds of millions of people and many businesses across the globe.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Foolish to Sell Mata, Says Hudson
headline.main: Chelsea Foolish to Sell Mata, Says Hudson

docs.snippet: Chelsea have been foolish to allow Spain playmaker Juan Mata's imminent transfer to Premier League rivals Manchester United, the club's former crowd favourite Alan Hudson said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea have been foolish to allow Spain playmaker Juan Mata's imminent transfer to Premier League rivals Manchester United, the club's former crowd favourite Alan Hudson said on Friday.
